role_description: An Ansible role that installs AWS CLI on nearly any platform and configures auto-completion
role_description_full_overview: The [AWS CLI](https://aws.amazon.com/cli/) is a unified tool to manage your AWS services. With just one tool to download and configure, you can control multiple AWS services from the command line and automate them through scripts.
role_description_alt: This repository is the home of an Ansible role that installs AWS CLI on nearly any platform and configures auto-completion.
